haxel.HxlSave

type
class
A class to help automate and simplify save game functionality.

Constructor

public new()
Blanks out the containers.

Instance Variables

private _so : flash.net.SharedObject

The local shared object itself.

public data : Dynamic

Allows you to directly access the data container in the local shared object.

public name : String

The name of the local shared object.

Instance Methods

public bind(Name : String) : Bool

parameters
Name The name of the object (should be the same each time to access old data).
returns
Whether or not you successfully connected to the save data.
Automatically creates or reconnects to locally saved data.

public erase(?MinFileSize : Int) : Bool

parameters
MinFileSize If you need X amount of space for your save, specify it here.
returns
Whether or not the clear and flush was successful.
Erases everything stored in the local shared object.

public forceSave(?MinFileSize : Int) : Bool

parameters
MinFileSize If you need X amount of space for your save, specify it here.
returns
Whether or not the flush was successful.
Writes the local shared object to disk immediately.

public read(FieldName : String) : Dynamic

parameters
FieldName The name of the data field you want to read
returns
The value of the data field you are reading (null if it doesn't exist).
If you don't like to access the data object directly, you can use this to read from it.

public write(FieldName : String, FieldValue : Dynamic, ?MinFileSize : Int) : Bool

parameters
FieldName The name of the data field you want to create or overwrite.
FieldValue The data you want to store.
MinFileSize If you need X amount of space for your save, specify it here.
returns
Whether or not the write and flush were successful.
If you don't like to access the data object directly, you can use this to write to it.
